moves.name: Poison Tail
moves.effect: Critical hits land more easily. Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target poisoned.

moves.name: X Attack
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Race You!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed by 2 stat ranks. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of leaving the target poisoned.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the user from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up the user’s moves when in a pinch.

passives.name: Critical Strike 1
passives.description: Powers up the user’s attacks when they become critical hits.
